hero.title: Your dreams are not just wishful thinking.
hero.subtitle1: TripNARA helps you turn "I want to go" into a travel route you can truly complete.
hero.subtitle2: From route direction and risk assessment to executable schedules, we ensure plans are not only beautiful, but realistic and reliable.
hero.microCopy1: Inspiration âœ“ â†’ Route â†’ Schedule â†’ Executable Checklist
hero.microCopy2: Dreams can be calculated into executable plans.

card1.title: First judge: Should this route exist?
card1.description: Instead of stuffing more attractions into the schedule, we first confirm whether the direction is reasonable, reachable, and executable.

card2.title: Completable each day, not just a list of points
card2.description: TripNARA generates executable schedule structures based on travel duration, stops, rhythm, and buffer.

card3.title: If circumstances change, it won't fall apart
card3.description: Closed? Weather? Insufficient energy? The system automatically generates optimal replacement solutions.

problem.title:
Most travel tools recommend more places.
We first ask whether the route itself makes sense.
problem.tripnaraRouteDesc: Coherent linear structure with route intelligence

routeDirection.title: RouteDirection
routeDirection.description:
A country is not a list of places.
It is a way the land wants to be walked.

decisionComparison.title: How TripNARA Differs from Regular Travel Apps
decisionComparison.description1: We don't start with "recommending more places." We start with a more fundamental question:
decisionComparison.question: Should this route exist at all?

personas.title: Three Partners Helping You Make Better Travel Decisions

abu.name: Abu
abu.title: Safety & Boundary Guardian
abu.subtitle: Polar Bear Polar Guardian
abu.tagline: I'm responsible: Can this route really be taken?
abu.description: Serious but gentle, not rushing for speed, always taking you to safe places
abu.details: Weather Â· Altitude Â· Vehicle condition Â· Capability matching
abu.why: Big, stable, calm. Natural survival expert with a protective nature. Softer than lions and tigers, more trustworthy.
abu.personality: Serious but gentle Â· Not rushing for speed Â· Always taking you to safe places
abu.visual: Guardian, steady, patient Â· Slight frown, thoughtful Â· Colors: serene blue/glacier white Â· Elements: shieldÂ·snowÂ·road signs

dre.name: Dr.Dre
dre.title: Rhythm & Energy Designer
dre.subtitle: Mountain Shepherd Dog
dre.tagline: Don't push too hard, I'll make every day just right.
dre.description: Considerate, rhythmic, stable, caring. Not leading from the front, but guiding the pace from the side, both smart and gentle.
dre.details: Best at: Taking care of the team's overall rhythm
dre.why: Not leading from the front, but guiding the pace from the side, both smart and gentle. Best at: Taking care of the team's overall rhythm.
dre.personality: Considerate Â· Rhythm Â· Stable Â· Caring
dre.visual: GentleÂ·detailedÂ·reliable Â· Light smile/thoughtful Â· Colors: forest green/soft brown Â· Elements: beat linesÂ·heartbeat curves

neptune.name: Neptune
neptune.title: Repair & Alternative Space Magician
neptune.subtitle: Navigation Otter
neptune.tagline: If it doesn't work, I'll give you a perfect alternative.
neptune.description: Smart, flexible, creative, empathetic. Good at solving problems, always finding alternatives, with a healing nature.
neptune.details: Understanding what you really want â†’ Providing gentle new paths
neptune.why: FlexibleÂ·smartÂ·curious. Good at solving problems, always finding alternatives. Has a healing nature.
neptune.personality: Smart Â· Flexible Â· Creative Â· Empathetic
neptune.visual: CleverÂ·warm Â· SmileÂ·sparkling inspiration Â· Colors: deep sea blue/starry purple Â· Elements: compassÂ·starsÂ·waves

optimizeTab.title: Make Executable
optimizeTab.description: Optimize route order and generate executable itinerary. After optimization, go to the "Decision Evaluation" tab to view persona assessments (Abu/Dr.Dre/Neptune).

workbenchHint.title: Need to evaluate your plan?
workbenchHint.description: After optimization, go to the "Decision Evaluation" tab to view comprehensive persona assessments including safety, pacing, and alternative suggestions.

workbenchTab.title: Decision Evaluation
workbenchTab.description: Evaluate itinerary plans through three personas (Abu/Dr.Dre/Neptune) for safety, pacing, and feasibility. Generate consolidated decisions and support plan comparison, adjustment, and commitment.

emptyState.title: Decision Evaluation Workbench
emptyState.subtitle: Let three personas help evaluate your itinerary plan
emptyState.description: Through comprehensive persona evaluation, ensure your itinerary plan is both safe and reasonable.

scheduleTab.title: Schedule
scheduleTab.description: Edit and manage daily itinerary, adjust time windows, resolve time conflicts, and add buffer time.

whatIfTab.title: What-If Scenario Comparison
whatIfTab.description: Generate multiple scenarios with different strategies and compare to choose the best. Difference from "Decision Evaluation" tab: What-If focuses on multi-scenario generation and comparison, while Decision Evaluation focuses on deep evaluation of a single plan.

risk.title: When Risks Appear
risk.text: This route has significantly higher risk than average under current conditions. We recommend choosing a safer alternative.

rejection.title: When We Need to Refuse
rejection.text: For safety reasons, we cannot recommend this route. This is how we take responsibility for travel.

success.title: When Journey Succeeds
success.text: What truly makes the journey successful is your choices and commitment. We are just your partner.

journey.title: Real User Journey Map
journey.subtitle: Your product journey is already very clear

discovery.title: Discovery Stage
discovery.description: User wants to travel but feels uncertain, doesn't want cookie-cutter trips, wants to "take it seriously" â†’ Enters TripNARA

understanding.title: Understanding Stage
understanding.description: They discover: Oh, this isn't a travel app, this isâ€”a Route Responsibility System. Trust + Relief

routeDirection.title: RouteDirection Selection
routeDirection.description: System provides: Optimal direction, explanation, risk warnings â†’ Rational + Human

planning.title: Route Building
planning.description: User participates, not just consumes. TripNARA is like a partner, not a "tour guide"

preparation.title: Execution Preparation
preparation.description: Risk coverage, budget monitoring, pace balance, backup plans â†’ Psychological security â†‘â†‘â†‘

review.title: Review
review.description: Journey is understood, value is preserved

manifesto.title: Brand Manifesto
manifesto.line1: TripNARA doesn't sell travel; we take seriously "how routes should be walked"
manifesto.line2: We believe travel is not escaping reality, but facing the world in a more dignified and mature way
manifesto.line3: We only recommend routes that are feasible
manifesto.commitment: This is our promise to the world
